title: Warehouse Management System
description: Developed a custom warehouse management system (WMS) to streamline the organization of inventory. This system optimized stock tracking, order fulfillment, and stock replenishment, resulting in a 20% increase in operational efficiency.

title: Supply Chain Optimization Project
description: Launched a project to optimize supply chain routes and reduce delivery times by analyzing historical data and identifying inefficiencies. This led to a 15% reduction in transportation costs and improved delivery times by 10%.

title: Client Portal for Order Management
description: Developed an online portal for clients to place and track their orders. The portal allows clients to view real-time order status, manage inventory, and streamline order requests, reducing errors and improving client satisfaction.
